name: Save Navelnii
description:
Your goal is to save the political prisoner Alexei Navelnii. He was detained and put in jail. Your task is to break through the streets of a Russian city to the prison and free the prisoner. The path to the prison is blocked by barricades guarded by policemen. To advance to the prison you need to completely destroy a group of policemen guarding the fence. After the destruction of the police, the barricade disappears.
To destroy the police officers you have 6 types of different weapons.
Get to the prison where the prisoner is being held and free him.

  • 1 beautiful map
  • 6 types of weapons
  • Advanced AI
